title: Configuartion [Sensitive] Information Disclosure
vulnerability_information:
Report Submission Form

Hello Team,

The Configuration Details are being leaked by the following url:  https://prow.k8s.io/config

## Steps to Reproduce

Click on the Below link to reproduce the issue - 
https://prow.k8s.io/config

## Impact

The Sensitive Information is being leaked. This information can be used to launch further attacks.

activities.message: Hi @barsainya - Thanks for the report. Specifically, what information found at `https://prow.k8s.io/config` is sensitive?
Hi @barsainya - I'm discussing this submission internally with the Kubernetes team. You will be updated as soon as there is additional information to share. Thanks for your patience!

Hi @barsainya - After discussing this report internally with the Kubernetes team, it was concluded that none of the values found in this config file are considered sensitive, it's simply a build config. As such, this report will be closed as `Informative`. Your effort is appreciated nonetheless, and best of luck on your future bug hunting!
Since we haven't heard back within the 30 day window, we're going to go ahead and disclose this report.
